body.p: By now we've discussed the mdoc language by way of example and a non-authoritative reference. I've even referenced some formatters, such as mandoc and nroff. In this part, I'll focus on the environment of mdoc: formatters, project integeration, and so on.
After reading this part, you'll have a much better idea of how to use mdoc on your operating system. Formatters and tools are available for most any system, UNIX and non-UNIX.
